ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | rspcimdv.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. B ) |
| 2 |  | rspcimdv.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-ral | |- ( A. x e. B ps <-> A. x ( x e. B -> ps ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ax-ia2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> x = A ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( x e. B <-> A e. B ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_biimprd | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( A e. B -> x e. B ) ) |
| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_imim12d | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ( x e. B -> ps ) -> ( A e. B -> ch ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 7 | #P_spcimdv | |- ( ph -> ( A. x ( x e. B -> ps ) -> ( A e. B -> ch ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_mpid | |- ( ph -> ( A. x ( x e. B -> ps ) -> ch ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_syl5bi | |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. B ps -> ch ) ) |
